lead_paragraph: The firm, Student Aid Institute, accused of illegally tricking student borrowers into paying fees for federal benefits, has been ordered to stop operations.

headline.print_headline: Consumer Bureau Shuts Down a Fraudulent Student Debt Relief Firm
headline.main: Fraudulent Student Debt Relief Firm Shut Down by Consumer Bureau

snippet: The firm, Student Aid Institute, accused of illegally tricking student borrowers into paying fees for federal benefits, has been ordered to stop operations.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column notes Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has shut down Student Aid Institute, contending company fraudulently duped student loan borrowers into paying fees for federal benefits; offers questions and answers about student loan relief.
